00464|   const checkAPIStatus = async (apiName: string, testFunction: () => Promise<any>) => {
00465|     try {
00466|       const result = await testFunction();
00467|       if (result && !result.error) {
00468|         setApiStatus(prev => ({ ...prev, [apiName]: 'подключено' }));
00469|         setApiStatusDetails(prev => ({ ...prev, [apiName]: '' }));
00470|       } else {
00471|         const errorDetail = result?.errorType || result?.details || 'ошибка';
00472|         setApiStatus(prev => ({ ...prev, [apiName]: 'ошибка' }));
00473|         setApiStatusDetails(prev => ({ ...prev, [apiName]: errorDetail }));
00474|       }
00475|     } catch (error: any) {
00476|       const errorMsg = error?.message || 'ошибка соединения';

00478|       setApiStatusDetails(prev => ({ ...prev, [apiName]: errorMsg }));
00479|     }
